amendment.description: To require any convention, agreement, or other international instrument on pandemic prevention, preparedness, and response reached by the World Health Assembly to be subject to Senate ratification.

action.text: Amendment SA 11 under the order of 3/23/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 49. Record Vote Number: 71.

Amendment SA 11 proposed by Senator Johnson. (consideration: CR S980-981) To require any convention, agreement, or other international instrument on pandemic prevention, preparedness, and response reached by the World Health Assembly to be subject to Senate ratification.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 11 proposed by Senator Johnson.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 11 under the order of 3/23/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 49. Record Vote Number: 71.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 11 under the order of 3/23/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 49. Record Vote Number: 71.
